page.title: 06Children + Staff
page.content:
There are not many children in the school. There are only 81 children in the school. The infants have 25 in the infant class. There are 28 in the sweenies and 28 in the juniors. We dont wear uniforms.We can wear any clothes. We dont have desks.The ages go from 4 to 11.We have boys and girls.Most of them live in Sileby .Our teacher said we are nice children.
Mrs Attard is the headmistress. She works in the office. She is small.She has grey hair.She is in the juniors half time. Miss Ray is deputy head. She teaches the infants. She is tall and thin. She has brown eyes and short hair. Mrs Page teaches the sweenies in the middle class. She is tall and thin. She wears pointed shoes and she she is nice. By Rebecca Harris and Robert Wills
